help.title: Question monitor help
help.text:
This module monitors a channel for comments in the form of a question. Non-questions will be removed on channels where this module is actively monitoring. In the case of a removal, the user will be notified over PM that their comment had ben removed.

Use the command %PREFIX%%COMMAND% to toggle this monitor on your channel.

queries.SET_SETTINGS: INSERT INTO `channel` (`channelID`, `qmonitor`) VALUES (?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `qmonitor` = ?
